chapter.text: Da pogibnut obe ruki Abu Lakhaba, kotorymi on prichinyal musul'manam vred, da pogibnet on vmeste s nimi
Ne spasli yego ot nakazaniya Allakha ni yego bogatstvo, kotoroye on nakopil, ni yego vysokoye polozheniye, kotoroye on priobrol
On budet vvergnut v pylayushchiy ogon', gde on budet goret'
V ogon', kak i on, voydot yego zhena, kotoraya klevetala na lyudey, seya razdor sredi nikh
Na sheye u neyo budet verovka iz pal'movykh volokon dlya bol'shego mucheniya
